archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Prepare Party Payment Plan
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Define basic party payment plan information, such as the amount and frequency of payments, as well as one or more payment methods that may be used to make payments.

properties.value: Prepare Party Payment Plan defines basic party payment plan information, such as the amount and frequency of payments, as well as one or more payment methods that may be used to make payments. Other aspects of the payment plan, such as terms and involved product offerings are defined by the Party Agreement Management process which is reused to create agreements with parties.
